previewArticle.title: DC United vs. Montreal Impact | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: DC United 1, Montreal Impact 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: First Half begins.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: D.C. United vs. Montreal Impact

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Foul by Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact).
Fabian Espindola (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Dan Stelly
timelineItems.text: Hopefully EJ makes like Jermain Defoe and puts one in the back of the net tonight #DCU

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: We're underway at RFK Stadium. #DCU can move into a (at least brief) tie for first with a win over the last-place Impact.

timelineItems.name: La Norte
timelineItems.text: Ohhhhhh United.....United VAMOS united.  #DCU

timelineItems.name: Vlad Oligarchsky
timelineItems.text: @MLSist 3-1 #DCU with goals by Espindola, De Leon and EJ gets on the board with a PK #RandomGuesses #IHaveNoIdeaWhatImTalkingAboot #Canada

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Y'a combien de supporters au RFK stadium ?? #DCU #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact).
Fabian Espindola (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: La principale mission de DC United ? Contenir Mapp, mais aussi empêcher les centres vers McInerney #DCvMTL

timelineItems.name: bembo98
timelineItems.text: At the #dcunited game #football #soccer #soccerfan #footballfan #eddiejohnson #enjoylife

timelineItems.text: Pourquoi on n'a pas un bon gaucher pour jouer couloir gauche? #IMFC

timelineItems.desc: Eddie Johnson (D.C. United) hits the bar with a header from the center of the box.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Keefer
timelineItems.text: Davy Arnaud getting beat up by Canadian teams so far this year. #HotTake #DCU

timelineItems.name: Jean-François Lepage
timelineItems.text: Heureux de voir que l'ancien et actuel capitaine d'#imfc porte le #8. #impacttvasports #Imfc

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: #DCU got a bit lucky there. Looked like a handball in the box on Arnaud, who had his arm extended.

timelineItems.name: Ed Morgans
timelineItems.text: #dcutalk Espindola's involvement in the attack. He's on pace for a career year and he's had a solid career already. #dcu

timelineItems.text: Why does God hate Eddie Johnson? #woodwork #DCUTalk

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Sérieusement, celui là il rentrait, j'arrêtais de touitter pour la soirée. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, D.C. United. Bill Hamid tries a through ball, but Fabian Espindola is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: James Covey FC
timelineItems.text: Wow, the gods are behind #IMFC so far but they really need to start making their own luck before they run out.

timelineItems.name: Alex Ménard
timelineItems.text: Va falloir changer cette défense et rapidement. Aucun, j'insiste, aucun joueur n'est à la hauteur. #ImpactTVAsports #IMFC

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Saturday evening match between D.C. United and the Montreal Impact. Will Eddie Johnson's snub be just the motivation he needed? Is the possession game the way to go for Montreal? Find out Saturday at 7pm ET on MLS Live.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Chris Rolfe (D.C. United) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Cristian Fernández.

timelineItems.name: Andre Gagne
timelineItems.text: Rarement vu une équipe autant stressante défensivement que #IMFC :( Chaque moindre attaque devient dangereuse... #DCUnited #impacttvasports

timelineItems.name: unitedmania
timelineItems.text: That was close for #dcu Finally they look good on set pieces

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Heath Pearce (Montreal Impact).
Eddie Johnson (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: La Norte
timelineItems.text: We are United..... #DCU

timelineItems.desc: Luis Silva (D.C. United) hits the bar with a right footed shot from outside the box.
timelineItems.title: CROSSBAR: Luis Silva hits a curling shot from distance

timelineItems.comment: Luis Silva (D.C. United) hits the bar with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Chris Rolfe.

timelineItems.name: Julien Tessier
timelineItems.text: Je sai pas trop quoi pensé, Est-ce que #IMFC est soudainement bon ou #DC est vraiment mauvais. #GeniusKlopas or #NASLchalenge

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: Announced attendance here at RFK: 14,106.

timelineItems.comment: Perry Kitchen (D.C. United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Silva o_O !! #IMFC #DCUnited

timelineItems.desc: Nick DeLeon (D.C. United) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Nick DeLeon goes in late on Nyassi

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Je suis en stress total. Je me liquéfie de l'intérieur, si on marque un 2e but ou qu'on en prend un, je ne réponds plus de rien. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Sanna Nyassi (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nick DeLeon (D.C. United).

timelineItems.name: Erik
timelineItems.text: We look as dangerous as an 8 year old with a lollipop #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Nick DeLeon (D.C. United) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Fabian Espindola with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  D.C. United. Conceded by Justin Mapp.

timelineItems.name: Return of the Mack
timelineItems.text: This ref is making it up as he goes #dcu

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Perry Kitchen (D.C. United).
Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: "Not much malice to it." ET VOILÀ LES JEUX DE MOTS AVEC MALLACE SONT COMMENCÉS.

timelineItems.name: Ed Morgans
timelineItems.text: EJ - just run and get in good spots. Don't worry about where the ball goes. Just play, my friend. #dcu

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Pas un très bon départ pour #IMFC. Espérons que la tempête passe. 7'

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: On en est donc à 5 coups de pied arrêtés en 6 minutes. Si on veut s'en prendre un rapidement, continuons sur ce rythme. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Justin Mapp with a cross.
Attempt missed. Fabian Espindola (D.C. United) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Cristian Fernández.

timelineItems.name: Return of the Mack
timelineItems.text: So this is embarrassing #dcu

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Hernán Bernardello tries a through ball, but Jack McInerney is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: Today's goal gave McInerney four in as many games in all competitions — three assisted by Mapp. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Si Gonzalez nous met le deuxième, je sors courir tout nu dans la rue. #IMFC

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  D.C. United 1, Montreal Impact 1. Eddie Johnson (D.C. United) header from the center of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Fabian Espindola with a cross.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Eddie Johnson opens his D.C. account with a thumping header

timelineItems.desc: Lewis Neal (D.C. United) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Lewis Neal gets overzealous

timelineItems.name: Ryan Keefer
timelineItems.text: WELP. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Greg_YNWA1
timelineItems.text: Eddie Johnson has scored a goal. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Edddieeeeee Johnsonnnnn! 1-1 #DCvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Lewis Neal (D.C. United).

timelineItems.name: Gregor Tankor
timelineItems.text: EJ!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! He lives!!!!!!!! #dcu

timelineItems.name: Robert Struthers
timelineItems.text: #IMFC blow it again. No excuse for this one.

timelineItems.name: Laurent
timelineItems.text: Lesson of the day: Kick a goalie in the head, dont worry, you won't get sent off. In fact you'll score later on in the game. @MLS #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Marc-André Mercier
timelineItems.text: Quand tu fais un sub pour défendre, FAUT défendre !!!! #IMFC #IMFClive #comeon

timelineItems.name: Matteo
timelineItems.text: My apologies for jinxing #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Jeb Brovsky tries a through ball, but Santiago González is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Bon, essayons néanmoins de ne pas le perdre. Je vais changer de bobettes moi, et allumer un encens. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: Un premier but pour Gonzalez? #ImpactTVASports #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Le plan de match de DC United est clair : enfoncer son adversaire ; pour le moment, ça marche bien #DCvMTL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Fabian Espindola (D.C. United) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Fabian Espindola and D.C. search for the winner

timelineItems.name: NatashaOjedaBanditto
timelineItems.text: One thing that I cant stand...#IMFC always passing the ball back when there are options up front. It trips me out! Off the ball movement plz

timelineItems.name: Steve Beauregard
timelineItems.text: Klopas va encore nous balancer son "on etait pas chanceux bla bla bla, 1 point sur la route c'est positif" so annoyed #imfc

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: It has been a long time since I have heard the #dcu be this loud.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Fabian Espindola (D.C. United) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Nick DeLeon.
Attempt blocked. Maxim Tissot (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Calum Mallace.

timelineItems.desc: Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Patrice Bernier pushes down DeLeon

timelineItems.comment: Nick DeLeon (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Brigite G
timelineItems.text: Yet a foot in a face was like butter and not important for a yellow card. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: Nice ovation for Eddie Johnson as he makes way for Conor Doyle in stoppage time. #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Conor Doyle (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: BrianWilde
timelineItems.text: The positive is DC is in a playoff spot and the Impact earned a draw vs them on the road. The negative is they should have won. #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, D.C. United 1, Montreal Impact 1.
